statements: SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases;
SELECT player_id, purchase_amount, item_purchased FROM in_game_purchases WHERE purchase_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT DISTINCT player_id FROM in_game_purchases ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT item_purchased, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_amount FROM in_game_purchases GROUP BY item_purchased ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 50 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, player_id, purchase_amount FROM in_game_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 50 ORDER BY purchase_datetime DESC
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases WHERE item_purchased LIKE '%sword%' LIMIT 10
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_amount, payment_method FROM in_game_purchases GROUP BY payment_method ORDER BY avg_amount DESC
SELECT purchase_id, player_id, purchase_amount FROM in_game_purchases WHERE purchase_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT player_id, COUNT(DISTINCT item_purchased) AS unique_items_purchased FROM in_game_purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT item_purchased) > 3
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_amount FROM in_game_purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT player_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM in_game_purchases GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT purchase_id, revenue_amount, analysis_date FROM revenue_analysis WHERE revenue_amount > 1000 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, purchase_id, revenue_amount FROM revenue_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-02-15';
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM in_game_purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT IP.*, RA.revenue_amount FROM in_game_purchases IP INNER JOIN revenue_analysis RA ON IP.purchase_id = RA.purchase_id WHERE RA.revenue_amount < 50 ORDER BY RA.analysis_date ASC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count, MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM in_game_purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING purchase_count >= 3 ORDER BY max_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, purchase_id, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue_analysis GROUP BY analysis_id, purchase_id ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_players;
SELECT player_name, registration_date FROM game_players WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, revenue_amount FROM revenue_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM game_players JOIN purchases ON game_players.player_id = purchases.player_id;
SELECT * FROM game_players ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_name, registration_date FROM game_players WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM purchases;
SELECT player_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM game_players INNER JOIN purchases ON game_players.player_id = purchases.player_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id, revenue_amount FROM revenue_analysis WHERE revenue_amount > 5000 ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username, registration_date FROM users
SELECT product_name, price FROM products
SELECT transaction_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM transactions
SELECT user_id, country FROM users
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, purchase_amount FROM transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT username, country FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, log_description FROM transactions_log WHERE log_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM game_transactions WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.purchase_amount, p.product_name, u.username FROM game_transactions t JOIN products p ON t.transaction_id = p.product_id JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id;
